name: Psy Scarlet
description:
A young psychic chases a thief into a dangerous power plant.

Game Length- 10~ mins

Controls:
Move - Arrow Keys
Jump  - A or Z
Attack - S or X
Confirm - Space

Dev's Note:
Invulnerability after getting hit is very brief! Enemies and spikes will combo you if you do not move to avoid them. Without upgrades, death may even be inevitable when landing on spikes.

"Sorry it's rather short! We wanted to do more but unfortunately worked only the last 2 weeks in. But thanks for playing :D" -Momo
